X,N = map(int,(input("")).split())
N1,N2,N3 = map(int,(input("")).split())
D1,D2,D3 = map(int,(input("")).split())
i = 0
a1ap1 = a2ap2 = 2.5
a1pd1 = a2pd2 = a3pd3 = 0
while i < X: 
  a1pd1 = (a1ap1 - N1) + a1ap1
  a2pd2 =(N+1 - a2ap2) + (N2 - a2ap2)
  a3pd3 = N+1-N3
  i = i +1

fa = [a1pd1,a2pd2,a3pd3]
time1 = int(max(fa))
print(time1)

X,N = map(int,(input("")).split())
N1,N2,N3 = map(int,(input("")).split())

fa=[]
if D1==D2:
    a1pd1 = N+1-N1
    a2pd2 = N+1-N2
else:
    if D2<0:
        i = (N1+N2)/2
        a1pd1 = 2*i-1
        a2pd2 = (N2-i)+(N+1-i)
        a3pd3 = N+1-N3 
    else:

fa = [a1pd1,a2pd2,a3pd3]

X,N = map(int,(input("")).split())
N1,N2,N3 = map(int,(input("")).split())
D1,D2,D3 = map(int,(input("")).split())

if D1==D2==D3 and D1>0 and D2>0 and D3>0:
    a1pd1 = N+1-N1
    a2pd2 = N+1-N2
    a3pd3 = N+1-N3
elif D1==D2 and D1>0 and D2>0 and D3<0:
    i=(N2+N3)/2
    a1pd1 = N+1-N1
    a2pd2 = (2*i-N2)
    a3pd3 = (N3-i)+(N+1-i)
elif D1>0 and D2<0 and D3>0:
    i = (N1+N2)/2
    a1pd1 = 2*i-1
    a2pd2 = (N2-i)+(N+1-i)
    a3pd3 = N+1-N3 
elif D1<0 and D2>0 and D3>0:
    a1pd1 = N1
    a2pd2 = N+1-N2
    a3pd3 = N+1-N3 
elif D1>0 and D2<0 and D3<0:
    i=(N1+N2)/2
    a1pd1 = 2*i-1
    j=N2-i
    a2pd2 = i+(N2-j)
    i=(a2pd2+N3)/2
    a2pd2=j+i
    a3pd3 = (N3-((i+N3)/2)) + (N+1-j) 
    
fa = [a1pd1,a2pd2,a3pd3]
time1 = int(max(fa))
print(time1)

X,N = map(int,(input("")).split())
N1,N2,N3 = map(int,(input("")).split())
D1,D2,D3 = map(int,(input("")).split())
i=0
j=0
if D1==D2==D3 and D1>0 and D2>0 and D3>0:
    a1pd1 = N+1-N1
    a2pd2 = N+1-N2
    a3pd3 = N+1-N3
elif D1==D2 and D1>0 and D2>0 and D3<0:
    i=(N2+N3)/2
    a1pd1 = N+1-N1
    a2pd2 = (2*i-N2)
    a3pd3 = (N3-i)+(N+1-i)
elif D1>0 and D2<0 and D3>0:
    i = (N1+N2)/2
    a1pd1 = 2*i-1
    a2pd2 = (N2-i)+(N+1-i)
    a3pd3 = N+1-N3 
elif D1<0 and D2>0 and D3>0:
    a1pd1 = N1
    a2pd2 = N+1-N2
    a3pd3 = N+1-N3 
elif D1>0 and D2<0 and D3<0:
    i=(N1+N2)/2
    a1pd1 = 2*i-1
    j=N2-i
    a2pd2 = i+(N2-j)
    i=(a2pd2+N3)/2
    a2pd2=j+i
    a3pd3 = (N3-((i+N3)/2)) + (N+1-j) 
else:
    a1pd1=N1
    a2pd2=N2
    a3pd3=N3
    
fa = [a1pd1,a2pd2,a3pd3]
time1 = int(max(fa))
print(time1)

# Enter your code here. Read input from STDIN. Print output to STDOUT
T=int(input())
for i in range(T):
    a,b,c,d,N = map(int,(input("")).split())
    y=N-1
    x=N-2
    xx=[a,b,c,d,N]
    if x==0:
      z=c*xx[0] + d*xx[y-1]
    elif y==0:
      z=c*xx[x-1] + d*xx[0]
    else:  
      z=c*xx[x-1] + d*xx[y-1]
    print(z)

N=int(input())
Na=list(map(int,input().split()))[:N]
q=int(input())
qA=[]
fP=[]
sP=[]
for i in range(q):
    qA.append(list(map(int,input().split()))[:q])
i=0
for z in range(q):
    for i in range(2):
        t2=qA[z][i]
        fP.append(t2)
    a=fP[0]
    b=fP[1]
    fP.clear()
    sum=0
    j=0
    for j in range (a,b+1,1): 
        sum += Na[j-1]
    sP.append(sum)
y=0
for y in range(len(sP)):
    print(sP[y])

t=int(input())
N,M,V,K = map(int,(input("")).split())
p=list(map(int,input().split()))[:M]

lArray=list(range(N))

for i in range(M):
      ch=p[i]-1
      lArray[(ch-1)]='x'
      lArray[(ch)]='x'
      lArray[(ch+1)]='x'
      
print(lArray)

N=int(input())
Na=list(map(int,input().split()))[:N]
q=int(input())
qA=[]
fP=[]
sP=[]
for i in range(q):
    qA.append(list(map(int,input().split()))[:q])
i=0
for z in range(q):
    for i in range(2):
        t2=qA[z][i]
        fP.append(t2)
    a=fP[0]
    b=fP[1]
    fP.clear()
    sum=0
    j=0
    for j in range (a,b+1,1): 
        sum += Na[j-1]
    sP.append(sum)
y=0
for y in range(len(sP)):
    print(sP[y])
